mobiles.name: king goblin Grumm
mobiles.long_description: Grumm, King of the Goblins isn't happy to see you.
mobiles.description: You see a balding, overweight goblin, but he looks quite tough!

mobiles.name: shaman goblin
mobiles.long_description: A goblin up from his writing and glares at your intrusion on his work.
mobiles.description: His face is sour and pale. He probably takes his religion very seriously.

mobiles.name: mage goblin
mobiles.long_description: A goblin mage is angered by your intrusion.
mobiles.description:
This goblin mage has been working for months towards this moment. And YOU
have intruded upon him! He looks REALLY pissed off! Clad in a pile of filth
your dog would not sleep in, he is much smaller than the other goblins in the
stronghold.

mobiles.name: champion goblin knarl
mobiles.long_description: Before you is the biggest goblin you have ever seen.
mobiles.description: Knarl glares right back at you.

mobiles.name: guard goblin
mobiles.long_description: A goblin guard eyes you suspiciously.
mobiles.description: A bit larger than your average goblin, guards are bullies to the others.

mobiles.name: guard goblin
mobiles.long_description: A goblin guard eyes you suspiciously.
mobiles.description: A bit larger than your average goblin, guards are bullies to the others.

mobiles.name: goblin
mobiles.long_description: A goblin is here, slacking off.
mobiles.description: He's ugly, green, and smelly... What's more to say?

mobiles.name: goblin prisoner
mobiles.long_description: A goblin is here, shackled to the wall.
mobiles.description: You notice his skin is more blueish... perhaps he's from another tribe?

mobiles.name: leper goblin
mobiles.description: He screams! Don't look at me!! Aaargh... leper outcast unclean!

mobiles.name: goblin
mobiles.long_description: A goblin is here, peeling potatoes.
mobiles.description: He's ugly, green, and smelly... What's more to say?

mobiles.name: demon lesser
mobiles.long_description: A dark, horned figure is trapped inside the pentagram.
mobiles.description: He really wants to get out of that pentagram. Maybe you should let him out?

mobiles.name: girl dancing goblin Britta
mobiles.long_description: A pretty female goblin entertains the court.
mobiles.description: She is quite pretty, even for a goblin.

mobiles.name: goblin jester
mobiles.long_description: A obnoxious little runt makes fun of you.
mobiles.description: He wears a stupid green suit with bells on it. You hate him.

objects.name: jacket goblin scale mail
objects.description: A goblin scale mail jacket is lying on the ground.

objects.name: jerkin goblin scale mail
objects.description: A goblin scale mail jerkin is lying on the ground.

objects.name: skirt goblin scale mail
objects.short_description: a goblin long scale mail skirt
objects.description: A goblin long scale mail skirt is lying on the ground.

objects.name: sleeves goblin scale mail
objects.short_description: a pair of goblin scale mail sleeves
objects.description: A pair of goblin scale mail sleeves is lying on the ground.

objects.name: shirt goblin chain mail
objects.description: A goblin chain mail shirt is lying on the ground.

objects.name: skirt goblin chain mail
objects.short_description: a goblin long chain mail skirt
objects.description: A goblin long chain mail skirt is lying on the ground.

objects.name: gauntlets goblin chain mail
objects.short_description: a pair of goblin chain mail gauntlets
objects.description: A pair of goblin chain mail gauntlets is lying on the ground.

objects.name: sleeves goblin chain mail
objects.short_description: a pair of goblin chain mail sleeves
objects.description: A pair of goblin chain mail sleeves is lying on the ground.

objects.name: crown king goblin
objects.short_description: the Great Crown of the Goblin King
objects.description: A simple crown of silver lies here. It looks quite old.

objects.name: grumm axe
objects.short_description: the Great War Axe of Grumm
objects.description: A quite large, two-handed and double bladed axe lies before you.

objects.name: helmet goblin horned dark
objects.description: A dark goblin horned helmet lies here

objects.name: arm guards granite
objects.short_description: a pair of carved granite armguards.
objects.description: You see a large hollow tube carved of granite.

extra_descriptions.description: These heavy armguards have been carved from the rock of these caverns.

objects.name: cape green filthy
objects.description: You see a pile of green rags on the floor

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a cape ridden with filth and vermin. You're not going to WEAR it are
you?

objects.name: dagger shard stone
objects.description: A sharp pointed rock lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: Looks like it would make a good weapon.

objects.name: sword goblin short
objects.description: It looks heavier than your average shortsword, but it could use sone oiling.

objects.name: potion frothing black
objects.description: You see a frothing black potion.

extra_descriptions.description: It's moving. You can see little bugs and other chunks floating in it.

objects.name: sword long two two-hand two-handed
objects.description: A long two-handed sword has been left here.

objects.name: key shaman goblin
objects.description: An old rusty key has been forgotten here.

objects.name: key king goblin
objects.description: An old rusty key has been forgotten here.

objects.name: key mage goblin
objects.description: An old rusty key has been forgotten here.

objects.name: key dungeon goblin
objects.description: An old rusty key has been forgotten here.

objects.name: rock big
objects.description: You see a big rock in the middle of the room. It looks real heavy.

objects.name: ring britta
objects.description: You almost miss a tiny ring of gold.

objects.name: Bookcase
objects.description: A large wooden bookcase

extra_descriptions.description:
Its a rather large wooden bookcase. There are many books in it, but they
are all written in GOBLIN!

objects.name: Desk
objects.description: A large mahogany desk is here.

objects.name: Throne
objects.description: King Grumm's Throne is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This throne must have been left behind by the dwarves. It's inlaid with
many fine gems and precious metals. Unfortunately, the largest of these have
long since been scavenged.

objects.name: table
objects.description: A large mahogany feast table is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This is by far the finest table you have ever seen. It stretches clear into
the north end of the Great Hall.

objects.name: table
objects.description: A large mahogany feast table is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This is by far the finest table you have ever seen. It stretches clear into
the south end of the Great Hall.

objects.name: gold
objects.description: A small pile of gold is here glitering.

objects.name: mace heavy iron
objects.description: A heavy iron mace lies in the rubble.

rooms.name: The Entry Hall to the Goblin Stronghold
rooms.description:
You step into a cavern chiseled from solid granite. The first thing
you notice is the stench. You see goblins everywhere, clad for battle.
Perhaps they are training for an assault on Midgaard, as they have been
spotted outside the South Gate more and more frequently. Whatever their
purpose here, you must put a stop to it. You see a hallways leading east
and west, and a set of great doors to the south.
   There is a small (Glowing) (Huming) tablet.

exits.description: North end of the Great Hall.

rooms.name: North End of the Great Hall
rooms.description:
This mighty vaulted cavern seems much too fine to have been crafted by
the likes of what you see here. Walls are built from carved granite blocks
which must weigh over a ton apiece. The smooth rock arches up to a perfect
semi-circular stone ceiling upon which a great battle scene is painted.
Tapestries and paintings line the walls, but these have fallen into
disrepair at the hands of the goblin occupants. A long mahogany dining
table stretches for a full twenty yards, well into the south end of the
Great Hall. You now notice that the subjects of the artwork here are
dwarven, not goblin. Perhaps the goblin legions overran this fortress and
drove the dwarves out. In any event, your work has just begun. The guards
have noticed you. You better be ready. The Great Hall continues south, with
doors east and west.

exits.description: The Entry Hall to the Goblin Stronghold.
South End of the Great Hall.

rooms.name: South End of the Great Hall
rooms.description:
This mighty vaulted cavern seems much too fine to have been crafted by
the likes of what you see here. Walls are built from carved granite blocks
which must weigh over a ton apiece. The smooth rock arches up to a perfect
semi-circular stone ceiling upon which a great battle scene is painted.
Tapestries and paintings line the walls, but these have fallen into
disrepair at the hands of the goblin occupants. A long mahogany dining
table stretches for a full twenty yards, well into the north end of the
Great Hall. A grand archway leads south, and through it you can see a
throne.

exits.description: North End of the Great Hall.

rooms.name: King Grumm's Throne Room
rooms.description:
Chaos reigns in the court of King Grumm. Jesters, dancing girls,
officious-looking goblins, and a myriad of other distractions compete for
the time of the king. The Throne Room is a perfectly-round chamber with
a large statue of a heroic-looking dwarf in the centre. Once again,
tapestries line the walls, portraying battles and glory. If it was possible
to instil more chaos into this carnival atmosphere, you have succeeded. The
king leaps to his feat, and goblin guards bar your escape back south. Grumm
dosen't look like he wants to talk! There is a doorway to your east, and
another to the west.

exits.description: South End of the Great Hall.

rooms.name: Goblin Shaman's Quarters
rooms.description:
This room is a delightful change from the rest of the fortress. The
air is sweet with the smell of incence, and the room is clean (by goblin
standards anyways). There is a large bookcase on the north wall, and before
it, a desk and chair.

rooms.name: Goblin Mage's Quarters
rooms.description:
A very heavy mist hovers above the floor here. It's not enough to
obscure your vision though, and when you look closer, you can see an inlaid
pentagram has been added to the granite stonework. The room is otherwise
spartan, though you can see a small cot and a desk. Otherwise the room is
barren.

rooms.name: Hidden Passage
rooms.description:
This passage s obscured behind the curtian. It leads north into the
Throne Room, and to the south there is a door.

rooms.name: Hidden Passage
rooms.description:
After opening the first door, you are dismayed to be confronted with a
second. The door leads south, with another leading back north.

rooms.name: Hidden Passage
rooms.description:
After opening the second door, you are dismayed to be confronted with
a third. The door leads south, with another leading back north.

exits.description: The Treasure Chamber of the Goblin Stronghold.

rooms.name: The Treasure Chamber of the Goblin Stronghold
rooms.description:
After opening the third door you come opon a cache of gold and
jewelry. There are no exits, save the door you came through.

rooms.name: A Small Cell in the Dungeon
rooms.description:
As you step through the door to this room, you hear a slam and a
click. You spin quickly and are dismayed to see that the door has closed
and locked. You hear maniacal laughter coming from the far side of the
door. There is no escape. You will spend your days rotting in this goblin
prision.

rooms.name: A Small Cell in the Dungeon
rooms.description:
This is a little 6x6 cell with a floor of straw. The air is damp here.
The far wall has a set of shackles set in the stone. Nice place to visit,
but you wouldn't want to live here.

rooms.name: A Small Cell in the Dungeon
rooms.description:
This is a little 6x6 cell with a floor of straw. The air is damp here.
The far wall has a set of shackles set in the stone. Nice place to visit,
but you wouldn't want to live here.

rooms.name: A Small Cell in the Dungeon
rooms.description:
This is a little 6x6 cell with a floor of straw. The air is damp here.
The far wall has a set of shackles set in the stone. Nice place to visit,
but you wouldn't want to live here.

rooms.name: A Small Cell in the Dungeon
rooms.description:
This is a little 6x6 cell with a floor of straw. The air is damp here.
The far wall has a set of shackles set in the stone. Nice place to visit,
but you wouldn't want to live here.

rooms.name: The Dungeon
rooms.description:
Below the iron grate is a small guardroom. There is a table and some
chairs, but not much else of interest. A hallway leads west, with the iron
grate exiting up.

rooms.name: A Hallway in the Stronghold
rooms.description:
This corridor is lit by torches set in wall brackets. An iron grate is
set in the floor, and from below you can hear moaning and scraping. The
hallway leads east with a large room to the south.

rooms.name: A Hallway in the Stronghold
rooms.description:
This corridor is lit by torches set in wall brackets. The hall
continues to the west, and the Entry Hall is to your east. There is also an
arched doorway to the south. You can hear the sounds of combat to the
south.

exits.description: The Entry Hall to the Goblin Stronghold.

rooms.name: A Hallway in the Stronghold
rooms.description:
This corridor is lit by torches set in wall brackets. The hallway
continues to the east, and the Entry Hall is to your west. There is also an
arched doorway to the south. Something smells foul there.

exits.description: Entry Hall to the Goblin Stronghold.

rooms.name: A Hallway in the Stronghold
rooms.description:
This corridor is lit by torches set in wall brackets. The hallway
continues to the west, and there is an arched doorway to the south.

rooms.name: Goblin Training Room
rooms.description:
This is where the goblins are shaped into something resembling a
fighting unit. Assorted dummies and training equipment lie around. The room
has a sticky film of blood on the floor. Apparently the goblins believe in
the Darwinian theory of military training.

exits.description: South End of the Great Hall.

rooms.name: Goblin Barraks
rooms.description:
This room is where the goblin soldiers sleep. The room is a full 20
yards square and there are bunks along each wall. There is graphic
graphitti scrawled on the walls, but it's in goblin and all you can make
out are the drawings of goblin females. There is an arched doorway leading
north.

rooms.name: The Kitchen
rooms.description:
A large kitchen area fills this room. Large pots bubble with
foul-smelling goblin cuisine. There is nothing in this room to interest
you. There is a door to your west, and an arched doorway to the north.

exits.description: South End of the Great Hall.

rooms.name: A Tiny Crawlspace
rooms.description: Below the cell there is a tiny crawlspace. There is a portal here.

exits.description: A Small Cell in the Dungeon.

rooms.name: A Hall in the Dungeon
rooms.description:
This place is a new addition to the Stronghold. The hallway is little
more than a tunnel through the rock. The hall leads east, with doors to
your north, south, and west.

exits.description: A Small Cell in the Dungeon.
A Small Cell in the Dungeon.
A Small Cell in the Dungeon.

rooms.name: A Hall in the Dungeon
rooms.description:
This place is a new addition to the Stronghold. The hallway is little
more than a tunnel through the rock. The hall leads west, with doors to
your north and south, a room to your east.

exits.description: A Small Cell in the Dungeon.
A Small Cell in the Dungeon.

rooms.name: Goblin Barraks
rooms.description:
This room is where the goblin soldiers sleep. The room is a full 20
yards square and there are bunks along each wall. There is graphic
graphitti scrawled on the walls, but it's in goblin and all you can make
out are the drawings of goblin females. There is an arched doorway leading
north.
